title: Quadrant Private Equity circles QMS Media
text:
Quadrant Private Equity is understood to be the mystery buyer circling out-of-home advertising business QMS Media.

The potential deal was first reported in Street Talk this week after QMS boss Barclay Nettlefold returned to Australia from a two week roadshow in the United States.

QMS Media boss Barclay Nettlefold. Joe Armao

He was spruiking his QMS Sport business in Los Angeles and New York, but it appears Quadrant has taken a shine to the whole shebang.

Moelis Australia is understood to be working with QMS, while Jefferies Australia is in the Quadrant camp.

Quadrant's interest in QMS Media comes amid a period of consolidation in the industry. Mid last year oOh!media bought Adshel for $570 million and JCDecaux took over APN Outdoor in a $1.2 billion deal.
description: Barclay Nettelfold was spruiking his QMS Sport business in Los Angeles and New York, but it appears Quadrant has taken a shine to the whole shebang
